senses.sense_definition: The owner or keeper of a wharf who manages the loading and unloading of ships.

examples.text: The <w>wharfinger</w> checked the manifest before allowing the cargo to be unloaded from the vessel.
As a <w>wharfinger</w>, he was responsible for the safety of goods stored on the dock until they were collected.

senses.sense_definition: A manager of a loading area along a railway line where goods are transferred to trains.

examples.text: The <w>wharfinger</w> signaled for the train to stop at the loading platform so the coal could be loaded.
She worked as a <w>wharfinger</w> organizing the freight shipments onto the railway wagons.
